personalInformation.summary: Hard Worker, Dedicated, Detailed Oriented, Experienced, Organized, and Highly Motivated. These are just some of the many attributes in which I possess as an individual. With over 5 years of experience in Human Resource administration and customer service, I have the talent to quickly adapt to new challenges. Within my experience, I focused on benefits administration, payroll, career development and employment law.
